00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 namespace lsf {
00010 namespace basic {
00011 
00012 class NonCopyable {
00013 public:
00014     NonCopyable() = default;
00015     ~NonCopyable() = default;
00016     NonCopyable(NonCopyable&&) = default; // allow move constructor
00017 
00018 private:
00019     NonCopyable(NonCopyable const& ) = delete;             // copy constructor is hidden
00020     NonCopyable &operator=(NonCopyable const& ) = delete;  // copy operator is hidden
00021 };
00022 
00023 }  // end of namespace basic
00024 }  // end of namespace lsf
